subject_terms_3: locomotives Pertadbiran Keretapi Tanah Melayu Photography
physical_appearance: "The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It has a black frame and its border is white in colour. Three men in uniforms can be seen standing, one on the extreme left and the other two on the extreme right hand side of the photograph respectively.  They are using a long metal tool and are applying some force to it, onto the locomotive. A large portion of the photograph is taken up by the locomotive that is stationed atop a railway turntable. The number ""6423"" is displayed at the front of the locomotive. The initials of the Malaysia rail operator
